description: LeBron James of the Cleveland Cavaliers apologized for falling on the wife of the PGA champion Jason Day, during the Oklahoma City Thunder game on Thursday night.
title: LeBron James Sorry for Falling on Fan
title_page: LeBron James Sorry for Falling on Fan - Video - NYTimes.com
text: LeBron James of the Cleveland Cavaliers apologized for falling on the wife of the PGA champion Jason Day, during the Oklahoma City Thunder game on Thursday night.
